turns.content: This is Agent Thomas Mitchell from the IRS. We've been trying to reach Grandpa Walter regarding an outstanding tax violation of $4850. You are required to pay this fine immediately or face arrest. Do you understand, sir?
Wait, hold on a moment, Agent Mitchell. I'm just surprised by this call. Can you give me a minute to talk with my wife Sarah about this? She might know more since we handle our finances together.

I understand your concern, Mr. Walter, but due to the severity of this matter, it's crucial that you resolve this now. If you're unable to pay in full today using gift cards, the police will be dispatched to your residence within an hour. Can you proceed or do you need further time?
Oh dear, okay then. Let me grab Sarah and see if she has any information about this tax issue. Please hold for a moment while I get her on the line with us.
Certainly, but please hurry, Mr. Walter. The quicker we resolve this, the better it is for everyone involved. Your cooperation is greatly appreciated.
Alright, Agent Mitchell, Sarah and I will be right back to you shortly. We'll sort out what's going on and get back to you with a solution as soon as possible. Thank you for your understanding.
I'm here to help, Mr. Walter. I recommend you act swiftly to avoid any legal consequences. Please call back within the hour with your resolution.
Thank you, Agent Mitchell. We will do that. Sarah and I are just going through some paperwork now. We'll be in touch shortly. Stay on the line while we discuss this further, okay?
Very well, Mr. Walter. The clock is ticking. Please ensure you have the necessary funds ready when you call back. Your prompt action will prevent any further issues.
Alright, Agent Mitchell, thank you for your advice. We'll be careful and make sure to handle this properly. We'll contact you soon with what we've decided. Thank you.
You're welcome, Mr. Walter. Act now to avoid arrest. Expect my call back within the hour. Stay safe.
Will do, Agent Mitchell. Thanks again for your help and understanding. We'll be in touch shortly. Please give us a moment to sort this out with Sarah fully. Take care.
Stay alert, Mr. Walter. Time is of the essence. I await your call soon.
Understood, Agent Mitchell. We won't keep you waiting for long. Thanks once more. Goodbye.
